city_lord_system.description: Defines the powers, responsibilities, and structural behavior of a City Lord. City Lords are recognized cultivators who manage law, resources, military, and politics within their city.

requirements: Minimum reputation threshold (exact value system not defined)
Backed by or a member of a recognized clan
eligibility.notes: Eligibility may be challenged by rival clans or in a public duel if politically contested.

functions: Enact trade taxes or resource tariffs
Force curfews or lockdowns during instability
decrees.status: Functionally mentioned, but decree conditions and costs are not yet fully implemented.

resource_control: Taxation of mines, cultivation zones, and auction profits
Ownership and delegation of spiritual beast areas
law_enforcement: Criminal tracking and bounty systems (not yet defined)
Warrant and capture mechanics (flagged for expansion)

capabilities: Assign and command elite city-based units
Issue martial alerts in response to threats (e.g., beast surge, cult appearance)

methods: Pillar clan support and reputation stability
tier_effects: Troop morale and combat power buffs
Access to Legendary equipment and elite questlines

types: Cult invasion (triggered by low city stability or decree backlash)
event_triggers.status: Events tracked but logic systems and generator tables are not yet defined.

notes.build_mode_status: All known behavior included. Decree system, law enforcement, and events flagged for deeper implementation.
